name: Nortenos Cantina
text:
Norteños Lunch Menu (11 am – 3 pm)
All items in this section are $15 unless otherwise noted.
3 Tacos + Chips & Salsa
Hand-pressed corn tortillas with onion, lime, coriander, pineapple, and choice of salsa (Roja, Verde, or Picante).
Choose any 3: Carnitas de Puerco (braised pork shoulder), Tinga de Pollo (spicy pulled chicken), Barbacoa de Res (braised beef) [add $0.75/taco], or Vegetariana (lentils).
2 Shrimp Tacos + Chips & Salsa
Spicy marinated shrimp, pico de gallo, and Monterey Jack cheese in a flour tortilla. Served with avocado crema.
2 Fish Tacos + Chips & Salsa
Lightly battered cod, pico de gallo, jalapeño, cucumber, and pickled onion slaw topped with avocado crema and served on a handmade corn tortilla.
Tortas + Chips & Salsa (Mexican sandwiches on Roma Bakery buns)
Pork Belly: Cucumbers, pickled onions, chipotle BBQ sauce, roasted garlic jalapeño aioli.
Fried Chicken: Lettuce, tomato, pickled red onion, roasted garlic jalapeño aioli.
''Cheese Steak'' [Add $1.50]: Braised beef, roasted poblano peppers, roasted onion, cheese, roasted garlic jalapeño aioli.
Enchiladas
Three corn tortillas stuffed with chicken and cheese, covered in salsa roja and topped with Monterey Jack cheese and crema.
Quesadillas + Chips & Salsa
Roasted poblano peppers, sautéed onions, cheese, side of avocado crema and choice of salsa.
Choice of: Pork, Chicken, Bean, or Beef (add $1).
Birria Burger + Chips & Salsa + Any Side
128g (4.5 oz) beef burger topped with poblanos, onions, birria beef, melted Monterey Jack cheese, roasted garlic jalapeño aioli on a Roma Bakery bun.
Birria Ramen
Ramen noodles cooked in beef broth with braised beef and shredded cheese, topped with onions and coriander.
Full Food Menu
Tacos & More
Tacos — 4.95 each
Shrimp Tacos — 7.50 each
Fish Tacos — 7.00 each
Birria Tacos — 17.25
Three beef tacos with Monterey Jack cheese, dipped in beef broth and fried. Served with 1.18 decilitre (4 oz) cup of beef jus.
